title: Enhancing Data Science Practical Competencies: Quest-Based Scientific Workforce Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can creatively solve science problems presented in 80% or more of the quests
Through peer evaluation and feedback, learners design three or more self-directed learning tasks
By the end of the course, learners voluntarily complete and present results for five or more customized challenge tasks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
